name: Noivern Pokemon Damage Calculator
description: A noivern based style for Pokemon Showdown's Damage Calculator. You can find me in Pokemon Showdown servers such as Origin.
additional_info:
To see this stylesheet download Stylish and add this style, and then load Pokemon showdown.
